name: Learn The Risk
memberOrga:
www.LearnTheRisk.org
Learn The Risk is a global not-for-profit organization educating on the real risks and dangers of pharmaceutical products, including vaccines. The organization was founded in 2015 by Brandy Vaughan, a former pharmaceutical insider and whistleblower. We represent more than 100,000 people worldwide.
goal: Learn The Risk is a global not-for-profit organization educating on the real risks and dangers of pharmaceutical products, including vaccines. The organization was founded in 2015 by Brandy Vaughan, a former pharmaceutical insider and whistleblower. www.LearnTheRisk.org
interests: Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health
